body_html:
yeah, hard-coding the sharding split is a bit ugly but

  • it won't change often
  • it's way simpler than threading the value through to cmake/buck/python from some single source of truth
  • if you get it wrong you get super obvious errors

body:
yeah, hard-coding the sharding split is a bit ugly but

- it won't change often
- it's way simpler than threading the value through to cmake/buck/python from some single source of truth
- if you get it wrong you get super obvious errors
